**Trishulas** are a blessed weapon, slightly stronger than the [demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") it was formed from. Like [eudemon blades](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") and [sacred scourges](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge"), it always has the [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") brand.

You can create a trishula through [the Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One")'s 6\* ability. You can turn a trishula back into a demon trident by using [Kikubaaqudgha](/Kikubaaqudgha "Kikubaaqudgha")'s or [Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu")'s final ability to replace its brand with [pain](/Pain_\(brand\) "Pain (brand)") or [distortion](/Distortion "Distortion"), though this is rarely a good trade.

Unlike other blessed weapons, you can't find trishulas on [angels](/Angel "Angel") or [daevas](/Daeva "Daeva"), although [Mennas](/Mennas "Mennas") may spawn with one. Trishulas are the only blessed weapon that can spawn as a [randart](/Randart "Randart"), but only if the unrand [Condemnation](/Condemnation "Condemnation") fails to spawn.

| Trishula                                                         | [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident")                                 | [Condemnation](/Condemnation "Condemnation")                                 |

| [![Trishula.png](/images/e/e1/Trishula.png)](/File:Trishula.png) | [![Demon trident.png](/images/6/69/Demon_trident.png)](/File:Demon_trident.png) | [![Condemnation.png](/images/f/f4/Condemnation.png)](/File:Condemnation.png) |

## Trivia

A [trishula](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trishula) is a stylized trident which is often seen as a Hindu or Buddhist religious symbol. Its exact symbolism varies from story to story, but it repeatedly sees use as a divine weapon wielded by numerous gods.

## History

- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), the [Condemnation](/Condemnation "Condemnation") [unrandart](/Unrandart "Unrandart") was introduced. This allowed [randart](/Randart "Randart") trishulas to (very rarely) appear randomly as a fallback for it.
- Prior to [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), these had 14 base damage but lacked [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching").

Trishulas are a blessed weapon, slightly stronger than the demon trident it was formed from. Like eudemon blades and sacred scourges, it always has the holy wrath brand.
